snippet.title: Georgia law expands rights on carrying guns
snippet.description: A roundup of news from around the nation.

snippet.title: Miss. governor signs mid-pregnancy abortion ban
snippet.description: Mississippi Gov. Phil Bryant on Wednesday signed a bill to ban abortion starting at the midpoint of a full-term pregnancy.

snippet.title: Instant analysis of the Redskins' 2014 schedule
snippet.description: Mike Jones takes a look at Washington's schedule game by game.

snippet.title: McDaniels says he's ready for NBA
snippet.description: K.J. McDaniels wanted to play in the NBA from the time he first picked up a basketball. Now, the Clemson forward says he's ready to turn that dream into reality.

snippet.title: Wizards' Bradley Beal, not yet 21, arrives by making big shot after big shot
snippet.description: Though he's not yet 21, Washington's hottest shot late in Game 2 displays a cool, mature demeanor.

snippet.title: Who's searching for LeBron James? All of America, evidently.
snippet.description: Google stats reveal a nationwide craving for Peyton Manning information, too.

snippet.title: Alabama defense dominates spring game
snippet.description: Blake Sims' bid to replace AJ McCarron as Alabama's starting quarterback hit a snag Saturday afternoon when the Crimson Tide defense dominated the annual A-Day game at Bryant-Denny Stadium.

snippet.title: D'Antoni to meet with Lakers soon about future
snippet.description: Mike D'Antoni was still the Los Angeles Lakers' coach when he left their training complex to spend the Easter weekend out of town with his family.

snippet.title: LA Lakers wrap lousy season with uncertain future
snippet.description: Although one of the worst seasons in Los Angeles Lakers history mercifully ended Wednesday night in San Antonio, the drama around the 16-time NBA champions is never finished.

snippet.title: 3-point threat Miller also Grizzlies' iron man
snippet.description: The Memphis Grizzlies hoped Mike Miller would be healthy once they got to the postseason.
